cause.description:
Warton is the best school to get an MBA. I am offering all donors a % of my personal equity after 10 years of graduation. The expected ROI should be around 500 percent.
At the friend's level ($1-$10)you will get $4$+%equity.
At the benevolent level ($11-$99)you will get $4$+%equity+ a mention in my 1st book.
At the hostile takeover level ($100+) you will get $4$+%equity+ a mention in my 1st book + 5 free hours of consulting.
All of this is contingent on raising at least $75,000. Otherwise I'm going to the University of Toronto.
1. David is the future of Marketing
2. David NEEDS to go to Warton
3. David can't afford $150,000 two-year tuition.
cause.mission: Send David to the Warton School of Business for a Marketing focused MBA.
cause.name: David Howse Marketing Guru
